name: places/ChIJ9wvhkvBYwokRpGW1rq8BDPg
formattedAddress: 30 Central Park S # 12A, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 30 Central Park S # 12A, New York, NY 10019-1650, USA

originalText.text:
Update: 09.24.23

PLEASE STAY AWAY FROM THIS AWFUL DENTIST!

Finally finished my orthodontic treatment after two years in braces, not Invisalign, that would have never worked.

Please review your dentist thoroughly before you go and believe the reviews that are repeatedly bad. And ask yourself do I want to be that person, that is taken advantage of, and had the warnings all along?

STAY AWAY AT ALL COSTS.  Takes advantage of people for pure profit.

The absolute worst scam artist. After Barton messed up my mouth with way overpriced Invisalign, that my current ortho says was completely crazy to even attempt, he wouldn't transfer my case and refused to refund any of my insurance payments that he billed 1 year in advanced. Stay away you have been warned!!!!!

Please go into the civil courts site in NJ

And type in his name.

originalText.text: I was a patient at Holistic Dentist on Park Place, and decided to take advantage of Dr. Barton's free consultation for Invisalign. He took his time and explained the whole process and cost. Now at the end of my treatment, my only regret is that I did not start the process years ago! I am very happy with my new smile and the overall experience.

text.text: I was a patient at Holistic Dentist on Park Place, and decided to take advantage of Dr. Barton's free consultation for Invisalign. He took his time and explained the whole process and cost. Now at the end of my treatment, my only regret is that I did not start the process years ago! I am very happy with my new smile and the overall experience.

originalText.text:
My holistic dentist's office on Park Place in Manhattan introduced me to Dr. Barton's expertise with the Invisalign system. It not only straightened my teeth, but corrected the TMJ pain that went unresolved using custom retainers.
Despite mixed reviews, my experience with him was great. His attention to detail and friendly personality are exactly what I needed to feel comfortable with the lengthy process.

originalText.text:
UPDATE:

This guy is completely unethical, match your records to all the people you have made false promises to, it's easy just google your name.  Take it from a real patient, this guy is the WORST

Kenneth Barton is the most unethical doctor I have ever encountered, who has victimized many, including myself.

I went to one doctor for a consultation, and that doctor, put me in a room with another doctor (Kenneth Barton), who, one year later, used my name and social security to try and claim $3,000 in "unpaid" payment from me.

He paid a lawyer to send claim for payment letters (not even to my house, to a relatives!) and is trying to bamboozle me into giving him $3,000.

Now there's is a collection agency trying to get this $3,000 dollars from me, with absolutely NO proof other than the fact that he said I owe it.

It's like walking up to a complete stranger in the street, and demanding that they give you $3,000 or else they're going to criminalize you, ruin your credit, and your financial future.

It's complete robbery, and he's getting away with it because he has a doctorate and a lawyer.

This is the most cruel, greedy, and unethical "doctor" I have encountered in my life.

This doesn't even get into all the patients he's hurt physically.  You can continue googleing to find them.

He should 100% be put out of business and behind bars.
